name: Spice Mix
perk: Wild spice blend that counts as any savory taste when completing a combo.

name: Salt
perk: Doubles the contribution of salty ingredients for one dish.

name: Sugar
perk: Adds an extra hit of sweetness, counting as an additional sweet ingredient.

name: Pepper
perk: Sharpens bitter flavors, canceling any penalty from matching bitters.

name: Ketchup
perk: Splashes in tangy acidity so one dish counts as having the sour taste.

perk: Spicy kick that boosts salty and savory pairings for the next combo.

perk: Silky finish that lets one ingredient count as any rich umami note you need.

name: Butter
